content.text: Ban Dedessinée is a queen and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.
Dedessinée is a woman with short silver-blue hair, blue eyes and purple lipstick. She wears a white headscarf and a crimson outfit. When she was preparing for the Levely, she also wore sunglasses.
Not much is known about Dedessinée's personality. She seems to believe in resolving things efficiently.
Dedessinée is the queen of a nation affiliated with the World Government and one of the few allowed to attend the Levely, which grants her some authority over matters concerning the world.
Sometime before the Levely, Dedessinée was one of the monarchs who were seen gathering at Mary Geoise.

Dedessinée later attended the beginning meeting of the Levely, where she was seated to the right of King Riku Doldo III. Upon hearing that Ham Burger would be the chairman, she believed that everything would proceed efficiently.

elements.text: Her name comes from bande dessinée, which means "comic" in French. It often refers to Franco-Belgian or Quebec comics.
Ban Dedessinée's name is not revealed in the manga, but is, instead, revealed in the anime credits of Episode 889, alongside other monarchs unnamed in the manga.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 82 Chapter 823 (p. 8) and Episode 777, Dedessinée makes her debut.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 90 Chapter 908 (p. 12-13) and Episode 889, Dedessinée attends the Levely.
↑  One Piece Anime — Episode 889, Ban Dedessinée is named in the captions and credits.
